subject: Prices and taxes question
description_text:
Hello,
I need a clear answer regarding your products on your webshop. Are the
prices with tax included? Or will I have tax added at checkout?

conversations.body_text: Hi Agata Fmic,    Our products do not include taxes, but they are typically tax-free. If you purchase from Europe, we have EU warehouses. We also have US warehouses for the United States.

Thank you for the information. I am from Europe, so the tax will be added
at checkout?

On Tue, Nov 25, 2025 at 12:36â€¯PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Agata Fmic,    We do not collect taxes on behalf of others.
